mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cart LEFT JOIN product ON cart.productNo = product.productNo WHERE userID = #{userID} order BY carNo DESC
select count(*) from cart where userID = #{userID} and productNo = #{productNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (productNo, imgNo, userID, count) VALUES ( #{productNo}, #{imgNo}, #{userID}, #{count})
mapper.delete: delete from cart where userID = #{userID } and carNo=#{carNo} AND productNo = #{productNo }
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET count=#{count} WHERE userID = #{userID } and carNo=#{carNo} AND productNo=#{productNo}
